alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 4:55PM CDT until May 22 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Wheeler County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northeastern Collingsworth County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 455 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southeast of Shamrock, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Shamrock and Twitty. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
